Class ButtonComponent

                      edu.luc.cs.trull.swing.ButtonComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, Component, java.util.EventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, PropertyChangeSource, SchedulerAware, Startable, Suspendable, Terminating, VisualComponent
public class ButtonComponent
extends ActionEventAdapter
implements VisualComponent

A visual component that provides a user interface consisting of a button panel. There is one button for each String event label specified in the constructor argument.
